catalogue_raissonne: K487, Harunobu zenshū (1942), #346; Ukiyo-e shūka 4 (1979), list #296-11
inscription: わびぬれハ身をうき草野根をたへえてさそふ水あればいなんとそおもふ {Wabinu re ba / mi wo ukikusa no / ne wo tae te / sasou mizu are ba / inan to zo omou} (When lonely / I\'m like a reed / cut down at the root. / Should any current invite / I would go along.)
medium: Woodblock print (nishiki-e); ink and color on paper
portfolio: From Untitled series of Thirty-six Poetic Immortals (Sanjūrokkasen 三十六歌仙)
title: Poem by Ono no Komachi
